Name: Watermelon (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Planze sie im Frühling. Wächst in 12 Tagen heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте весной. Вырастает через 12 дней и продолжает давать урожай после первого сбора.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to grow, and continues to produce after the first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天种植。 生长需要12天，在第一次收获后继续结果。
